verses.verse: Behold, <WH2005> a king<WH4428> shall reign<WH4427> in righteousness,<WH6664> and princes<WH8269> shall rule<WH8323> in judgment.<WH4941>

And a man<WH376> shall be<WH1961> as a hiding place<WH4224> from the wind,<WH7307> and a covert<WH5643> from the tempest;<WH2230> as rivers<WH6388> of water<WH4325> in a dry place,<WH6724> as the shadow<WH6738> of a great<WH3515> rock<WH5553> in a weary<WH5889> land.<WH776>
And the eyes<WH5869> of them that see<WH7200> shall not<WH3808> be dim,<WH8159> and the ears<WH241> of them that hear<WH8085> shall hearken.<WH7181>
The heart<WH3824> also of the rash<WH4116> shall understand<WH995> knowledge,<WH3045> and the tongue<WH3956> of the stammerers<WH5926> shall be ready<WH4116> to speak<WH1696> plainly.<WH6703>
The vile person<WH5036> shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> called<WH7121> liberal,<WH5081> nor<WH3808> the churl<WH3596> said<WH559> to be bountiful.<WH7771>

For <WH3588> the vile person<WH5036> will speak<WH1696> villainy,<WH5039> and his heart<WH3820> will work<WH6213> iniquity,<WH205> to practice<WH6213> hypocrisy,<WH2612> and to utter<WH1696> error<WH8442> against<WH413> the LORD,<WH3068> to make empty<WH7324> the soul<WH5315> of the hungry,<WH7457> and he will cause the drink<WH4945> of the thirsty<WH6771> to fail.<WH2637>

The instruments<WH3627> also of the churl<WH3596> are evil:<WH7451> he<WH1931> deviseth<WH3289> wicked devices<WH2154> to destroy<WH2254> the poor<WH6041> with lying<WH8267> words,<WH561> even when the needy<WH34> speaketh<WH1696> right.<WH4941>
But the liberal<WH5081> deviseth<WH3289> liberal things;<WH5081> and by<WH5921> liberal things<WH5081> shall he stand.<WH6965>
Rise up,<WH6965> ye women<WH802> that are at ease;<WH7600> hear<WH8085> my voice,<WH6963> ye careless<WH982> daughters;<WH1323> give ear<WH238> unto my speech.<WH565>
Many days<WH3117> and years<WH8141> shall ye be troubled,<WH7264> ye careless women:<WH982> for<WH3588> the vintage<WH1210> shall fail,<WH3615> the gathering<WH625> shall not<WH1097> come.<WH935>

Tremble, <WH2729> ye women that are at ease;<WH7600> be troubled,<WH7264> ye careless ones:<WH982> strip<WH6584> you, and make you bare,<WH6209> and gird<WH2290> sackcloth upon<WH5921> your loins.<WH2504>
They shall lament<WH5594> for<WH5921> the teats,<WH7699> for<WH5921> the pleasant<WH2531> fields,<WH7704> for<WH5921> the fruitful<WH6509> vine.<WH1612>

Upon <WH5921> the land<WH127> of my people<WH5971> shall come up<WH5927> thorns<WH6975> and briers;<WH8068> yea,<WH3588> upon<WH5921> all<WH3605> the houses<WH1004> of joy<WH4885> in the joyous<WH5947> city: <WH7151>

Because <WH3588> the palaces<WH759> shall be forsaken;<WH5203> the multitude<WH1995> of the city<WH5892> shall be left;<WH5800> the forts<WH6076> and towers<WH975> shall be<WH1961> for<WH1157> dens<WH4631> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> a joy<WH4885> of wild asses,<WH6501> a pasture<WH4829> of flocks;<WH5739>

Until <WH5704> the spirit<WH7307> be poured<WH6168> upon<WH5921> us from on high,<WH4480> <WH4791> and the wilderness<WH4057> be<WH1961> a fruitful field,<WH3759> and the fruitful field<WH3759> be counted<WH2803> for a forest.<WH3293>
Then judgment<WH4941> shall dwell<WH7931> in the wilderness,<WH4057> and righteousness<WH6666> remain<WH3427> in the fruitful field.<WH3759>
And the work<WH4639> of righteousness<WH6666> shall be<WH1961> peace;<WH7965> and the effect<WH5656> of righteousness<WH6666> quietness<WH8252> and assurance<WH983> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>
And my people<WH5971> shall dwell<WH3427> in a peaceable<WH7965> habitation,<WH5116> and in sure<WH4009> dwellings,<WH4908> and in quiet<WH7600> resting places;<WH4496>
When it shall hail,<WH1258> coming down<WH3381> on the forest;<WH3293> and the city<WH5892> shall be low<WH8213> in a low place.<WH8218>
Blessed <WH835> are ye that sow<WH2232> beside<WH5921> all<WH3605> waters,<WH4325> that send forth<WH7971> thither the feet<WH7272> of the ox<WH7794> and the ass.<WH2543>
